content: the spiked potholder designed to match the spiked dishcloth the matching dishcloth can be found here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/spiked-cotton-dishcloth this is a modern and stylish spiked crochet potholder pattern that uses the spiked sedge stitch a video tutorial for this pattern is available crochet potholder pattern 1 materials needed 150 yards of a #4 medium-weight cotton yarn 4 5mm crochet hook > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //youtu be/pys1lfwkhii 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
